util

Class MultiBonus

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.MultiBonus

  • public class MultiBonus
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class provides Methods to support Items, that have variable Boni.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Haeldeus

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int amountBonus
      The amount of the default Bonus, this Item adds.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Tree> boni
      All possible Boni, this Item can provide.
      private Stat defaultBonus
      The Stat, this Item might provide as default bonus for all possible Boni.
      private int id
      The id of this Item.
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of this Item.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MultiBonus(java.lang.String name, int id)
      Creates a new MultiBonus with the given name for the Item with the given ID.

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private final java.lang.String name
        The name of this Item.

      • id

        private final int id
        The id of this Item.

      • boni

        private java.util.ArrayList<Tree> boni
        All possible Boni, this Item can provide. They are saved as an ArrayList of Trees.

      • defaultBonus

        private Stat defaultBonus
        The Stat, this Item might provide as default bonus for all possible Boni.

      • amountBonus

        private int amountBonus
        The amount of the default Bonus, this Item adds.

      • createTigerTreeDiff

        public void createTigerTreeDiff(int lowerF,
                                int upperF,
                                int lowerS,
                                int upperS,
                                double chance)
        Creates a Tree of the Tiger for this Item with the given Stat-borders, which may be different to each other and the Chance, this Item comes with this Tree as a Bonus.
        Parameters:
        lowerF - The lower Border for the Agility Stat.
        upperF - The upper Border for the Agility Stat.
        lowerS - The lower Border for the Strength Stat.
        upperS - The upper Border for the Strength Stat.
        chance - The chance, that the Item has this Bonus.
        Since:
        1.0

      • createRestorationTree

        public void createRestorationTree(int stamina,
                                  int spellPower,
                                  int mpFive,
                                  double chance)
        Adds a Restoration-Tree to the List of Boni.
        Parameters:
        stamina - The amount of Stamina, this Tree adds.
        spellPower - The amount of SpellPower, this Tree adds.
        mpFive - The amount of Mana per Five Seconds, this Tree adds.
        chance - The chance, that the Item drops with this Tree as Stats.
        Since:
        1.0

        public void createSorceryTree(int stamina,
                              int intellect,
                              int spellPower,
                              double chance)

        public void createStrikingTree(int strength,
                               int agility,
                               int stamina,
                               double chance)

        Parameters:

        Since:
        1.0

      • createSubTree

        private SubTree createSubTree(Stat attribute,
                              int lower,
                              int upper)
        Creates a new SubTree for this MultiBonus, that can be added to a Tree.
        Parameters:
        attribute - The Attribute, this SubTree defines.
        lower - The lower Border of the Attribute.
        upper - The upper Border of the Attribute.
        Returns:
        A new SubTree, that defines an Attribute with the given Borders.
        Since:
        1.0

      • createTree

        private Tree createTree(java.lang.String modName,
                        SubTree left,
                        SubTree right,
                        double dropChance)
        Creates a new Tree, with the given Attributes.
        Parameters:
        modName - The Name of this Tree (e.g. " of Strength", " of the Bear", etc.).
        left - The SubTree, that defines the left Stat of this Tree.
        right - The SubTree, that defines the right Stat of this Tree.
        dropChance - The chance, the Item this Tree is added to comes with this Tree as Bonus.
        Returns:
        A new Tree with the given Attributes.
        Since:
        1.0

      • createTripleTree

        private Tree createTripleTree(java.lang.String modName,
                              SubTree left,
                              SubTree middle,
                              SubTree right,
                              double dropChance)
        Creates a Tree with 3 defining Stats and the given Attributes.
        Parameters:
        modName - The Name of this Tree (e.g. " of Strength", " of the Bear", etc.)
        left - The SubTree, that defines the left Stat of this Tree.
        middle - The SubTree, that defines the middle Stat of this Tree.
        right - The SubTree, that defines the right Stat of this Tree.
        dropChance - The chance, the Item this Tree is added to comes with this Tree as Bonus.
        Returns:
        A new Tree with the given Attributes.
        Since:
        1.0

        private void addToList(Tree mod)
        Adds the given Tree to the List of boni.

      • getAllItems

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<Stat,java.lang.Integer>> getAllItems()
        A Method, that returns every single Item, that is possible with its' given MultiBonus-Trees as an ArrayList of HashMaps, that resemble the Stats, this Item might have.
        E.g., if an Item has +(5-7) Intelligence, this Method returns a List with the Values for an Item with +5 Intelligence, another Entry for one with +6 Intelligence and a last one with +7 Intelligence.
        If there are even more Possibilities, with other Stats or even combined Stats, this Method returns these Entries as well.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of HashMaps, that resembles all possible Stats for this Item.
        Since:
        1.0
